name.ja: <ruby>陽だまりのひととき<rt>メモリー・オブ・サンリット</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During a turn you have not activated "Memory of Sunlit".

effect.en: Excavate the top 6 cards of your Deck. You can Special Summon 1 excavated Level 5 or lower EARTH Attribute Galaxy Type monster face-up to your field. Place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order. This turn, you can only attack with EARTH Attribute Galaxy Type monsters.
